item.description: We are Cambridge Women's Community Action. FOr the second year in a row we are catering the very worthwhile Transgender Remembrance Day in Boston. Come on Blush Ladies volunteer to give us a hand as this is a worthwhile very touching candlelight service. While the celebrants are at the service we will be getting ready to serve a fantastic buffet for their reception. We would love to have you on board with us
item.name: Volunteer to Serve with CWCAO for Transgender Remembrance Day
